rows.label: qst202011_msg001
rows.name: We gave her the Ohagi.

rows.label: qst202011_msg002
rows.name:
She said she's going to
scold you severely later.

rows.label: qst202011_msg003
rows.name: But she looked really happy.

rows.label: qst202011_msg004
rows.name:
I see, so she found out. This is
going to be scary... Hahaha...

rows.label: qst202011_msg005
rows.name: Urrggh *cough cough hack*

rows.label: qst202011_msg006
rows.name: Hey! Are you okay, old man?!

rows.label: qst202011_msg007
rows.name: *cough cough splutter*

rows.label: qst202011_msg008
rows.name: Call Musubi!

rows.label: qst202011_msg009
rows.name:
W-wait! *cough cough* I'll be...
*pant pant* I'll be fine...

rows.label: qst202011_msg010
rows.name:
I don't want to worry Musubi.
Please, could you keep this quiet?

rows.label: qst202011_msg011
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst202011_msg012
rows.name: It's fine. I'm not that fragile.

rows.label: qst202011_msg013
rows.name:
Ah, while we're at it, could I
ask you for one more favor?

rows.label: qst202011_msg014
rows.name: You want us to get some medicine?

rows.label: qst202011_msg015
rows.name:
No, no. Back when I was
active... about 30 years ago...

rows.label: qst202011_msg016
rows.name:
Musubi and I found a
pair of golden bracers.

rows.label: qst202011_msg017
rows.name: Gold!?

rows.label: qst202011_msg018
rows.name:
Yes, quite rare, isn't it?
It's quite a treasure.

rows.label: qst202011_msg019
rows.name:
We weren't short on money at the
time, so since we had more than we
needed, we decided to hide them.

rows.label: qst202011_msg020
rows.name: I want you to dig up those memorabilia.

rows.label: qst202011_msg021
rows.name: I see. Where did you hide them?

rows.label: qst202011_msg022
rows.name:
In the Fief of Forgetfulness
in the Superbia Empire.

rows.label: qst202011_msg023
rows.name: However, according to Musubi...

rows.label: qst202011_msg024
rows.name: What is it? Did I do something?

rows.label: qst202011_msg025
rows.name:
Oh, perfect timing. I was just thinking
of asking Rex and others to retrieve
the bracers we buried long ago.

rows.label: qst202011_msg026
rows.name:
That was in the Fief of Forgetfulness
in Superbia, wasn't it?

rows.label: qst202011_msg027
rows.name: No, that's not right~

rows.label: qst202011_msg028
rows.name:
It was at the Ruins of
Fountain Park in the Kingdom
of Invidia, as I recall.

rows.label: qst202011_msg029
rows.name: Was it? No, that can't be right.

rows.label: qst202011_msg030
rows.name: No, it was definitely in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202011_msg031
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst202011_msg032
rows.name:
Ah, I can't remember anymore.
Please search both places!

rows.label: qst202011_msg033
rows.name: How careless...

rows.label: qst202011_msg034
rows.name:
Can't be helped. Let's
go search both places.
